Service Details: - Promotes workplace health and safety for workers and employers of BC- Consults with and educates employers and workers and enforces the Occupational Health and Safety Regulation- In the event of work-related injuries or diseases, WorkSafeBC works with the affected parties to provide return-to-work rehabilitation, compensation, health care benefits, and a range of other services
